long_description: A convenient accesory to your Feedback Bike Stand, this tray holds your tools within arm's reach. Mounts to all Feedback Stands and the Park Consumer Stand with a tool-less clamp. Molded plastic tray has a variety of compartments to keep tools organized including holes for Allen and cone wrenches, lubes and even a coffee mug. Includes a hook for a shop rag or towel and features a large cavity with a drain hole and removable plug for soaking parts in a solution as you work.
short_description: A convenient accesory to your Feedback Bike Stand, this tray holds your tools within arm's reach.
